H0.text: In January 1968 who was chosen as leader of the Communist Party in Czechoslovakia. Antonín Novotný

H1.text: In January 1968 who was chosen as leader of the Communist Party in Czechoslovakia. Gustáv Husák

H2.text: In January 1968 who was chosen as leader of the Communist Party in Czechoslovakia. Josef Smrkovský

H3.text: In January 1968 who was chosen as leader of the Communist Party in Czechoslovakia. Dubcek

A4.text: They voted no confidence in Novotný by splitting the functions of the president and party leader. He remained president but was replaced by Dubček as First Secretary.

A5.text: He remained president but was replaced by Dubček as First Secretary.
